user.title: Humidity Control
user.description: Set up a combined humidity control (humidifier/dehumidifier)

data_description.name: Name for this humidity control entity
data_description.wet_entity: Entity to turn on when humidity is too low (optional)
data_description.dry_entity: Entity to turn on when humidity is too high (optional)

options.title: Options
options.description: Configure additional settings for humidity control

data_description.dry_tolerance: How far below target before humidifying starts
data_description.wet_tolerance: How far above target before dehumidifying starts
data_description.keep_alive: Interval to resend commands to devices
data_description.sensor_stale_duration: Turn off if sensor doesn't update within this time
data_description.initial_state: Whether to start enabled when Home Assistant starts
data_description.away_humidity: Target humidity when in away mode
data_description.away_fixed: If enabled, away humidity cannot be changed
